label: Udm: Base Deployed Infrastructure As Code
description: The supertype for infrastructure as code deployeds with output variables.

properties.name: deployable
properties.label: Deployable
properties.description: The deployable that this deployed is derived from.

properties.name: container
properties.label: Container
properties.description: The container on which this deployed runs.

properties.name: placeholders
properties.label: Placeholders
properties.description: A Map containing all the placeholders mapped to their values. Special values are <ignore> or <empty>

properties.name: environmentPath
properties.label: Environment path and name
properties.description: Path to the new environment. If empty, the generated CIs will be added to the target environment. If you specify an environment name, the new environment will be created in the same folder as the target environment. If you specify a folder and an environment name, they will be created in the same folder as the target environment. You can also specify a full path starting with 'Environments/'.

properties.name: automaticDictionary
properties.label: Create dictionary from output variables
properties.description: If true, XL Deploy will automatically create a dictionary containing the output variables and add it to the environment.

properties.name: dictionaryPath
properties.label: Dictionary path and name
properties.description: Path to the dictionary containing the output variables. If empty, the dictionary name will be the name of the template concatenated with -dictionary. If you specify a dictionary name, it will be created in the same folder as the target environment or in the folder specified for the new environment. You can also specify a full path starting with 'Environments/'.

properties.name: generateCIsFromResources
properties.label: Generate CIs from resources
properties.description: If true, XL Deploy will automatically create CIs based on resources that are deployed.

properties.name: generatedConfigurationItems
properties.label: Generated CIs
properties.description: Set of infrastructure resources mapped to configuration items.
